name: Shooting Zombie: Crazy World
description:
Shooting Zombie: Crazy World is all about killing zombies simulator. Mankind is destroyed by deadly virus from africa that turns people into terrible zombies. There was epic world war, zombie apocalypse, and now you are the only one who has survived. But for how long? Every minute you are in danger, you need to act quickly and effectively in order to survive and get out of this hellish city.
Features:
- Classic 3D action control
- Realistic 3D graphics
- Dynamic effects
- Very scary and dangerous deads
- Crowd of the evil running zombies
- Open space 3D enviroment zombie land
- Shooting off zombie heads, arms and legs
